title: Camille's decision to turn her legs into swords really wasn't a well thought out idea
body:
Having blades as legs is not very practical nor subtle, especially since she's supposed to be a government assassin. 

Think about it, she has to kill someone and chops their head off using her blade legs. Now she's got blood all over her appendage and that blood will leave a trail. That's the last thing you want as a killer assassin who wants to remain secret. 

Also, walking or running wouldn't that dull the tip of the blade and cause horrible imbalance? The girl from Kingsman, her legs are designed to be able to walk and keep balance. A little tip wouldn't be able to carry the weight of a thicc lady I don't think. 

I don't think she was of sound mind when deciding to turn her legs into swords
